Package edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier

Class documentSignature

java.lang.Object
edu.odu.cs.cs350.acmClassifier.documentSignature
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class documentSignature extends Object implements Serializable
Stores data from a text document in the form of a document signature. Contains a data structure of words and corresponding numbers denoting the weight of each word in the signature
See Also:

    • documentSignature

      public documentSignature()
      Default constructor

    • documentSignature

      public documentSignature(Collection<String> sentence)
      Construct a new document signature containing existing data in the form of a sentence (vector of strings).
      Parameters:
      sentence - : a collection of strings, each (presumably) containing a word

  • Method Details

    • getMapping

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getMapping()
      Gets the hash map signature.
      Returns:
      A hash map containing String keys (words) and Integer values (frequencies)

    • getVocabulary

      public Vocabulary getVocabulary()
      Gets the associated vocabulary of known words
      Returns:
      The vocabulary

    • getWords

      public SortedSet<String> getWords()
      Gets the words in the signature. Does not retrieve word frequency.
      Returns:
      A sorted set of strings containing each word in the signature

    • getFrequencies

      public Vector<Integer> getFrequencies()
      Gets the frequency of each word in the signature. Does not retrieve the words themselves. The frequency is ordered by the appearance of the words in the vocabulary in alphabetical order
      Returns:
      A vector of Integers containing each word frequency in the signature (This is effectively the rawSignature)

    • get

      public int get(String word)
      Gets the total number of times that the word appears in the document.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to search for
      Returns:
      count: the number of times a specified word appears

    • getAll

      public Vector<Integer> getAll(Collection<String> words)
      Gets the total number of times that the word appears in the document.
      Parameters:
      word - : the word to search for
      Returns:
      count : the number of times a specified word appears

    • getTotalFrequency

      public int getTotalFrequency()
      Used to retrieve total number of words in document signature
      Returns:
      the total number of words

    • set

      public void set(String word, int count)
      Manually set the word count of a word
      Parameters:
      word - : A string denoting the desired word count to be set; a key to the value of word count to be altered
      count - : An integer number denoting the desired frequency of the set word

    • setAll

      public void setAll(Map<String,Integer> newCounts)
      Manually set the word count of many words at once
      Parameters:
      newCounts - : A map denoting the desired words and counts to be set

    • setAll

      public void setAll(Vocabulary newVocab)
      Set the words in the vocabulary to the map. Clears all map elements that aren't contained in the vocabulary
      Parameters:
      newVocab - : An existing vocabulary

      public void add(String newWord)
      Adds a new word to the documentSignature's wordVector
      Parameters:

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares two documentSignatures for equality. Signatures are considered equal if their wordFrequency mappings are equivalent.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - : object to be compared for equality with this signature
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is equal to this one

    • empty

      public boolean empty()
      Check if the signature is empty i.e. if it contains no words
      Returns:
      true iff empty
